chart_metadata.name: qbittorrent
chart_metadata.description: The qBittorrent project aims to provide an open-source software alternative to µTorrent.

runAsContext.description: qBittorrent can run as any non-root user.

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for qBittorrent

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for qBittorrent.

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that qBittorrent will run as.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that qBittorrent will run as.

attrs.label: Web Port
attrs.description: The port for the qBittorrent Web UI.

attrs.label: BT Port
attrs.description: The port for the qBittorrent BitTorrent protocol. Both TCP and UDP

attrs.label: Use HTTPS Probe
attrs.description:
Use HTTPS probe for the qBittorrent Web UI. </br>
This will ONLY affect the probes, only enable this if you
configured HTTPS in the qBittorrent Web UI.

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.</br>

attrs.label: qBittorrent Downloads Storage
attrs.description: The path to store qBittorrent Downloads.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>

SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to a persistent volume claim.

ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB Share (Mounts a persistent volume claim to a SMB share)

attrs.label: Size (in Gi)
attrs.description: The size of the volume quota.

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: CPU limit for qBittorrent.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid CPU limit formats are</br>
- Plain Integer - eg. 1</br>
- Float - eg. 0.5</br>
- Milicpu - eg. 500m

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for qBittorrent.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6

1.2.12.app_readme:
qBittorrent

The qBittorrent project aims to provide an open-source software alternative to µTorrent.
